entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed 'limit->OperGet() == GT_ARR_LENGTH' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #74785
    8.0.0
  • [Android] VectorSingle and VectorDoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest fails on Android x64 #74781
    8.0.0
  • Cleanup of third-party-notices files #74779
  • Arm64: RCPC, DC ZVA and probably RDM ISAs are never detected on win-arm64 #74778
    8.0.0
  • Consider updating tool for updating 3rd-party notices to be smarter about duplicates #74775
  • Assertion failed 'varDsc->lvDoNotEnregister || varDsc->lvIsMultiRegRet' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #74774
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(parentLoop.lpFlags & LPFLG_REMOVED) == 0' during 'Assertion prop' #74773
    7.0.0
  • String.Replace(char, char) now slower in some cases #74771
    7.0.0
  • JIT: get rid of shortName for phases #74768
    Future
  • Tool for updating 3rd-party notices should be more resilient to changes in dependencies #74766
  • runtime - Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #74765
    8.0.0
  • llvm-project - Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #74764
    8.0.0
  • How to install an ASP Core .NET 6 as windows service? #74759
  • BigInteger.Parse creates invalid instances from hex strings #74758
    8.0.0
  • Performance issue with ASP .NET 6.0 integration tests executed on .NET 7.0-preview #74756
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AlpnInUse #74755
    8.0.0
  • Regression in the XmlBaseWriter.cs #74752
    7.0.0
  • Distributed transactions: TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction doesn't work #74745
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: SyncTableEntry::GetSyncTableEntry()[sbIndex].m_Object == obj #74741
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbNatLoopNum == loopNum' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #74739
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Javascript #74734
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.Versioning #74733
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net #74732
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\keepalive\\keepalive.cmd #74731
  • Test failure reflection/Tier1Collectible/Tier1Collectible/Tier1Collectible.sh #74730
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [System.Net.Http.Json] Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net.Http.Json #72403
    7.0.0
  • CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.InvariantModeTests.TestLastIndexOf, object reference not set to an instance of an object #74179
    7.0.0
  • firefox-DebuggerTests - TaskCanceledException in random tests #74640
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Collections #72407
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Need to add support on Unix for recursive Crst #74680
  • LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator not using incremental generator caching #74557
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest asserts on Android #74708
    8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] New test RegexPcre2Tests added in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests testsuite is failing #74057
    Future
  • [ppc64le] Debug build only - Crash related to stack unwinding while running System.Runtime test case #74069
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json.Tests Fails on Android #50868
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Functional.Tests fails on Android #50866
    Future
  • DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyy/MM/dd") is not working #74737
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime` tests failing with uncaught exception on Windows/AOT/chrome #72752
    8.0.0
  • Add support for the s390x architecture #34195
    Future
  • TarReader stops enumerating entries when stream is unseekable #74728
  • [NativeAOT] Fail if a ILCompiler package runtime major version is different from target runtime #74387
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.GetExportCookie #74120
    Future
  • F# compiler crashes with DOTNET_TieredPGO=1 #74295
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • CI: Fix helix test results reporting #74788
    blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix incorrect "illegal XML comment chars" check & add regression tests #74787
    area-System.Xml
  • Add missing System.Formats.Tar docs #74786
    area-System.IO
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move more legs out of runtime-staging #74783
  • [Android] Skip VectorSingle and VectorDoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest on x64 #74782
    area-System.Numerics
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Preference sources of copy-like casts to destinations #74777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction() #74776
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] enable background GC on Unix #74772
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish… #74769
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix `JSExport` on struct and records #74763
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES file #74760
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Fix Linux armv6 build on runtime-community.yml #74757
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][test] install handlers for unhandled exceptions on browser #74751
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. #74749
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0] Move distributed transaction test to OleTxTests #74748
    area-System.Transactions
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Sort out side of GetChildKeys #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add Nick to area-owners.json #74761
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74738
    area-System.Memory
  • [wasm] Move `src/tests/BuildWasmApps/*` to `src/mono/wasm` #74698
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add missing System.Net.Http.Json API docs #74770
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add missing System.Collections API docs #74767
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix signature for 64-bit delegate profiling helper #74743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74740
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74516
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Move distributed transaction test to OleTxTests #74747
    area-System.Transactions
  • [NativeAOT] enable background GC on Unix #74735
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable firefox debugger tests for rolling builds #74753
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable KerberosExecutor on LinuxBionic, it doesn't have GSSAPI libraries #74709
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ppc64le bug fixes #74746
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74567
    area-System.Memory, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Nick to fabric-bot config #74666
    area-Meta
  • #50866 enable configuration functional test on android #74651
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • #50868 enable configuration json tests on Android #74647
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Annotate System.Runtime.Serialization for AOT warnings #74663
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Mark UnmanagedCallersOnlyTest as NativeAOT incompatible #74546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74648
    area-System.Transactions, 8.0.0
  • Fix mentioned default value of DOTNET_TC_OnStackReplacement_InitialCounter #74729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix signature for 64-bit delegate profiling helper #74500
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add WaitAsync functionality to Background Service #74789
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ARM64] - JitDisasm - Make zero values and commas consistent #74717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use nproc without --all on Linux #74696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Clean up SuperPMI collection scripts #74598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • improve hanling of TLS certificates on Linux #74695
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Fix json Serializer (all Proprties should be used) #73121
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74692
  • Skip System.Net.Requests tests on mono linux-arm64 #74668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Mark certain compiler-created locals as aliased #74665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `lvPromotedStruct` #74702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74726
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74638
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Reuse shared invoker and throw on incompatible WebSocket options #74473
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #74525
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Log exit codes in browser samples to prevent tests from timeouting #74637
  • Fix possible stack overflow in HttpListener #74644
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
